page.title: 12LANDSCAPE 2
page.content: {CHISLET MILL}:there were once a lot of windmills in the Kent area. Chislet Mill is still standing today. You can see it from the Thanet way but few recognize it as a{SMOCK MILL.}It is quite far from Chislet Village and some people call it not Chislet Mill but Reculver Mill. The inside of the mill has still got all its works. It used to have single_shuttered spring sails that made the 3 pairs of stones turn. Chislet Mill dates back to the{ {17th CENTURY.}In 1901 the mill operated for a few years with a paraffin engine as motive power. The mill today is not beautiful on the outside because it has been covered with corrugated iron to protect it from weather. Inside its complete and {UNDAMAGED
